General.Name: Hestia Insight Inc
General.Description: Hestia Insight Inc. provides strategic consulting and capital market advisory services for micro, small, and medium sized companies in the healthcare, biotech, and fintech sectors. It also develops healthcare related technologies for the treatment of neurological and psychiatric disorders. In addition, the company provides medical supply sales support and management, and sales and marketing guidance and services. The company was formerly known as Luxshmi Investments, Inc. and changed its name to Hestia Insight Inc. in May 2019. Hestia Insight Inc. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Las Vegas, Nevada.
General.Address: 400 South 4th Street, Las Vegas, NV, United States, 89101
